```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')
library(workbch)
workbch_sethome(path = params$path)
prettify <- workbch:::prettify
```

### Details

```{r details, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
jobs <- view_jobs(show_hidden = FALSE)
for(i in 1:nrow(jobs)) {
  cat("<details>")
  cat("<summary><span style='font-size:120%'>", jobs$jobname[i], "</span></summary>")
  view_job(jobs$jobname[i])
  cat("</details>")
}
```
